info.author: Amin Paydar
info.description:
=======
BaleBot
=======

A simple python implementation `Bale Messaging <https://bale.ai>`_ bot API
===========================================================================

Features
========

* Simple, small and extensible. It's easy to write own `Bale Messaging <https://bale.ai>`_ bots.
* Pure Python with asyncio and aiohttp
* Websocket connection to Bale ws|wss API-endpoint
* Sending and receiving messages
* API module
* Integration with `API.AI <https://api.ai>`_

API module
==========

- Messaging: SendMessage

- Files: UploadFile, DownloadFile

Requirements
============

* Python >= 3.5.1
* `aiohttp >= 0.22.0 <https://github.com/KeepSafe/aiohttp>`_
* (optional) async_timeout >= 1.1.0


Create your Bot in 2 step
=========================
Prerequisites
=============
* Install Python 3.5+
* Instal balepybot. you have 2 option :
    * Option 1

        .. code-block:: bash

         pip3 install balepybot

    * Option 2

        .. code-block::

         git clone https://github.com/baleapp/balepybot
         pip3 install aiohttp
         cd balepybot



Step 1. Create your own conversation
====================================

Make your own conversation inherited from base class *Conversation*.:

.. code-block:: python


    from balebot.bots import Conversation

    class SampleEchoBotConversation(Conversation):
        startText = '''
                Hi! I'm a bale bot!
                Type me help for see available commands.
        '''
        slashCommands = (
        ('/start', 'show this message'),
        ('/help', 'show this message'),)


        """ Simple echo bot """
        async def message_handler(self, message):
            out_msg = messaging.SendMessage(self._get_id(),
                                            peer=self._peer,
                                            message=message)
            await self.send(out_msg)

        async def response_handler(self, message):
            await super().response_handler(message)

...

Step 2. Run Bot
===============

write your bot runner :

.. code-block:: python

    #file name = SampleBot.py
    from balebot import Bot
    import SampleEchoBotConversation

    echobot = Bot(token='YOUR_BOT_TOKEN',
                  name='SOME_BOT_NAME',
                  conversation=EchoConversation)


.. code-block:: bash

    python3.5 SampleBot.py



Messaging API
=============
SendMessage
===========

.. code-block:: python

    from balebot.api import Peer, messaging
    from balebot.bots import Conversation

    class ExampleConversation(Conversation):
        def sample(self):
            dest = Peer(peer_type='User', peer_id='2529523898',
                        accessHash='-3273354428490000423')
            out_text = messaging.TextMessage(text='Sample text')
            out_msg = messaging.SendMessage(self._get_id(),
                                            peer=dest, message=out_text)
            self.send(out_msg)


File API
========
Upload File
===========
.. code-block:: python

    from balebot.api import files
    from balebot.bots import Conversation

    class ExampleConversation(Conversation):
        def sample(self):
            with open(path_to_file, 'rb') as f:
                data = f.read()

            out_msg = files.UploadFile(self._get_id(), bytes=list(data))
            self.send(out_msg)

DownloadFile
============
.. code-block:: python

    from balebot.api import files, FileLocation
    from balebot.bots import Conversation

    class ExampleConversation(Conversation):
        def sample(self):
            fl = FileLocation(fileId='-7247132302682398484',
                              accessHash='-3538373762880660987', fileStorageVersion=1)

            out_msg = files.DownloadFile(self._get_id(), fileLocation=fl)
            self.send(out_msg)


Integration with `API.AI <https://api.ai>`_
===========================================
you can develop your bots for Bale using `API.AI <https://api.ai>`_

.. code-block:: python

    from balebot import Bot
    from balebot.bots import EchoConversation

    apiiobot = Bot(token='YOUR_BOT_TOKEN',
                  name='SOME_BOT_NAME',
                  conversation=ApiAiConversation,
                  params={'token': 'YOUR_api.io_CLIENT_TOKEN'})
info.name: balepybot
info.summary: A simple python implementation Bale Messaging App bots
